price: Sεdeε wͻbɛsi ahunu adeε kann ate asεm kann wͻ Ɛda a wͻbεba Yεn hͻ no, nanso abͻneεfoͻ no wͻ ͻyera pefee mu nnε.
arabic: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: asmiʿ bihim wa-abṣir yawma yatūnanā lākini al-ẓālimūna al-yawma fī ḍalālin mubīnin
